Articles.Content:
Is there a mod around that lets you train up kerbonauts without doing actual missions?

Maybe something like put a five star and a rookie into a training lab in orbit and after a set time the rookie gains a star - maybe only up to one less than the highest teacher?

MKS/OKS has Akademy part. (Alreadty 1.0)

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79588](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79588)

Civilian Population has several specific parts (University, Flight School, etc). (Yet 0.90 - until EPL upgrade)

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112142-90-Civilian-Population-1-3](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112142-90-Civilian-Population-1-3)
